caseTitle: Commissioner of Income Tax v. M/s Balochistan Concrete and Block Wokrs Ltd.
tagline: The industrial undertaking is entitled to carry forward the losses incurred during the tax holiday period and have it set-off against the income earned in the assessment years beyond the tax holiday period in accordance with S. 35 of the Income Tax Ordinance, 1979. However, the industrial undertaking is not entitled to carry forward to the post-tax holiday period the unabsorbed depreciation allowances that arose during the tax holiday period.
